  <title>Historic_Landslide_Points</title>
  <abstract>DOGAMI compiled this data from several datasets including DOGAMI SP-34 (landslide points from 1996-1997) and SP-53 (1995-2020). Each feature class dataset includes 29 fields. The dataset is a compilation of center points of published or known historic (roughly 1928-2023 in Oregon) landslides and any available information about these landslides including damage and losses and several other attributes. The structure and content of the file feature classes are also detailed in Appendix B of the SLIDO-4.0 report.

Historic Landslide Points, is a compilation of center points of published or known historic (roughly 1928-2023 in Oregon) landslides and any available information about these landslides including damage and losses and several other attributes.

DOGAMI compiled this data from several datasets including DOGAMI SP-34 (landslide points from 1996-1997) and SP-53 (1995-2020). Each feature class dataset includes 29 fields. The structure and content of the file feature classes are also detailed in Appendix B of the SLIDO-4.0 report.
